Every dish is just plain amazing here!  We had the Ox tail stew, the paella with squid ink, the grill octopus, the razor clam. With a glass of red wine on the side, this is how a great vacation should felt like!  The service here are very friendly and warm.  We are so lucky to have Mrs. Zhang, one of the waitress who speaks Chinese to help m y fiancée and I order the seasonal specialties.  Everything is so delicious and has the rich flavor from the northern Spain region.  This is a place not to be missed when you visit the famous Sagrada Familia! Also there is a generous discount offer if you make reservation online through TripAdvisor! :)
